content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. I can help you schedule an appointment for plumbing, electrical, or HVAC needs. May I have your name, please?
Uh, yeah, it’s Jess. I think it’s a plumbing thing? I’m not sure how this works.
Thank you, Jess! I can help you with your plumbing issue. Can you please provide your address, so I can make sure we serve your area and get someone scheduled?
It’s 172 Maple Lane. Is it expensive? I don’t know if I should wait.
Thank you for your address, Jess. Pricing can depend on the specific plumbing issue. Would you like a general estimate, or do you want to describe the problem first?
Uh, I think the sink is clogged? Water isn’t draining, I tried some stuff but it didn’t work.

Thanks for explaining! For a clogged sink, our typical estimate ranges from $90 to $150, depending on the issue. Would you like to schedule a visit for a more accurate quote? When would be a good time for you?
Um, maybe tomorrow afternoon? Or is that too soon?
Tomorrow afternoon works! I’ll check our team’s availability and confirm your appointment for then. Does a window between 1 PM and 3 PM work for you?
Yeah, that’s fine. How will I know when they’re coming?
Great! I am confirming your appointment for tomorrow between 1 PM and 3 PM at 172 Maple Lane. You’ll receive a reminder before the plumber arrives. Is text okay for the reminder?
Yep, text is good. Thanks for helping, I was kind of lost.
You’re very welcome, Jess! Your appointment is booked for tomorrow between 1 PM and 3 PM. We’ll send you a reminder by text. If you have any questions, just reply here. Have a great day!
